long: Meaning: to "fix" upon (by agreement or appointment); by implication, to "meet" (at a stated time), to "summon" (to trial), to "direct" (in a certain quarter or position), to "engage" (for marriage).  Usage: agree,(maxke an) appoint(-ment, a time), assemble (selves), betroth, gather (selves, together), meet (together), set (a time).  Source: a primitive root;
